message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a special price of $13,000. I think you'll really love it, and I'm confident you'll get a lot of value out of it. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you coming down from your initial price. I'm really interested, but I'm looking to pay closer to $11,500. If you're willing to consider that, I'd be happy to move forward.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $11,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. I think it's a fair price that balances our interests. What do you think?
